data.name: hppRequest_merchantId_size
data.value: Merchant ID is required and must be between 1 and 50 characters

data.name: hppRequest_merchantId_pattern
data.value: Merchant ID must only contain alphanumeric characters

data.name: hppRequest_account_size
data.value: Account must be 30 characters or less

data.name: hppRequest_account_pattern
data.value: Account must only contain alphanumeric characters

data.name: hppRequest_orderId_size
data.value: Order ID must be less than 50 characters in length

data.name: hppRequest_orderId_pattern
data.value: Order ID must only contain alphanumeric characters, dash and underscore

data.name: hppRequest_amount_size
data.value: Amount is required and must be 11 characters or less

data.name: hppRequest_amount_pattern
data.value: Amount must only include numeric characters

data.name: hppRequest_amount_otb
data.value: Amount must be 0 for OTB transactions (where validate card only set to 1)

data.name: hppRequest_currency_size
data.value: Currency is required and must be 3 characters in length

data.name: hppRequest_currency_pattern
data.value: Currency must only consist of alphabetic characters

data.name: hppRequest_timestamp_size
data.value: Time stamp is required and must be 14 characters in length

data.name: hppRequest_timestamp_pattern
data.value: Time stamp must be in YYYYMMDDHHMMSS format

data.name: hppRequest_hash_size
data.value: Security hash must be 40 characters in length

data.name: hppRequest_hash_pattern
data.value: Security hash must only contain numeric and a-f characters

data.name: hppRequest_autoSettleFlag_pattern
data.value: Auto settle flag must be 0, 1, on, off or multi

data.name: hppRequest_comment1_size
data.value: Comment 1 must be less than 255 characters in length

data.name: hppRequest_comment1_pattern
data.value: Comment 1 must only contain the characters a-z A-Z 0-9 ' ", + \u201C\u201D ._ - & \ / @ ! ? % ( ) * : £ $ & \u20AC # [ ] | = ; ÀÁÂÃÄÅÆÇÈÉÊËÌÍÎÏÐÑÒÓÔÕÖ×ØÙÚÛÜÝÞßàáâãäåæçèéêëìíîïðñòóôõö÷ø¤ùúûüýþÿ\u0152\u017D\u0161\u0153\u017E\u0178¥

data.name: hppRequest_comment2_size
data.value: Comment 2 must be less than 255 characters in length

data.name: hppRequest_comment2_pattern
data.value: Comment 2 must only contain the characters a-z A-Z 0-9 ' ", + \u201C\u201D ._ - & \ / @ ! ? % ( ) * : £ $ & \u20AC # [ ] | = ; ÀÁÂÃÄÅÆÇÈÉÊËÌÍÎÏÐÑÒÓÔÕÖ×ØÙÚÛÜÝÞßàáâãäåæçèéêëìíîïðñòóôõö÷ø¤ùúûüýþÿ\u0152\u017D\u0161\u0153\u017E\u0178¥

data.name: hppRequest_returnTss_size
data.value: Return TSS flag must not be more than 1 character in length

data.name: hppRequest_returnTss_pattern
data.value: Return TSS must be 1 or 0

data.name: hppRequest_shippingCode_size
data.value: Shipping code must not be more than 30 characters in length

data.name: hppRequest_shippingCode_pattern
data.value: Shipping code must be of format [digits from postcode]|[digits from address] and contain only a-z A-Z 0-9 , . - / | spaces

data.name: hppRequest_shippingCountry_size
data.value: Shipping country must not contain more than 50 characters

data.name: hppRequest_shippingCountry_pattern
data.value: Shipping country must only contain the characters A-Z a-z 0-9 , . -

data.name: hppRequest_billingCode_size
data.value: Billing code must not be more than 60 characters in length

data.name: hppRequest_billingCode_pattern
data.value: Billing code must be of format [digits from postcode]|[digits from address] and contain only a-z A-Z 0-9 , . - / | spaces

data.name: hppRequest_billingCountry_size
data.value: Billing country must not contain more than 50 characters

data.name: hppRequest_billingCountry_pattern
data.value: Billing country must only contain the characters A-Z a-z 0-9 , . -

data.name: hppRequest_customerNumber_size
data.value: Customer number must not contain more than 50 characters

data.name: hppRequest_customerNumber_pattern
data.value: Customer number must only contain the characters a-z A-Z 0-9 - _ . , + @ spaces

data.name: hppRequest_variableReference_size
data.value: Variable reference must not contain more than 50 characters

data.name: hppRequest_variableReference_pattern
data.value: Variable reference must only contain the characters a-z A-Z 0-9 - _ . , + @ spaces

data.name: hppRequest_productId_size
data.value: Product ID must not contain more than 50 characters

data.name: hppRequest_productId_pattern
data.value: Product ID must only contain the characters a-z A-Z 0-9 - _ . , + @ spaces

data.name: hppRequest_language_pattern
data.value: Language must be 2 alphabetic characters only, optionally followed by an underscore and alphabetic country or region code

data.name: hppRequest_cardPaymentButtonText_size
data.value: Card payment button text must not contain more than 25 characters

data.name: hppRequest_cardPaymentButtonText_pattern
data.value: Card payment button text must only contain the characters a-z A-Z 0-9 ' , + \u201C\u201D ._ - & \ / @!? % ( ) * :£ $ & \u20AC # [] | =

data.name: hppRequest_cardStorageEnable_size
data.value: Card storage enable flag must not be more than 1 character in length

data.name: hppRequest_cardStorageEnable_pattern
data.value: Card storage enable flag must be 1 or 0

data.name: hppRequest_offerSaveCard_size
data.value: Offer to save card flag must not be more than 1 character in length

data.name: hppRequest_offerSaveCard_pattern
data.value: Offer to save card flag must be 1 or 0

data.name: hppRequest_payerReference_size
data.value: Payer reference must not be more than 50 characters in length

data.name: hppRequest_payerReference_pattern
data.value: Payer reference must only contain the characters a-z A-Z\ 0-9 _ spaces

data.name: hppRequest_paymentReference_size
data.value: Payment reference must not be more than 50 characters in length

data.name: hppRequest_paymentReference_pattern
data.value: Payment reference must only contain characters a-z A-Z 0-9 _ - spaces

data.name: hppRequest_payerExists_size
data.value: Payer exists flag must not be more than 1 character in length

data.name: hppRequest_payerExists_pattern
data.value: Payer exists flag must be 0, 1 or 2

data.name: hppRequest_validateCardOnly_size
data.value: Validate card only flag must not be more than 1 character in length

data.name: hppRequest_validateCardOnly_pattern
data.value: Validate card only flag must be 1 or 0

data.name: hppRequest_dccEnable_size
data.value: DCC enable flag must not be more than 1 character in length

data.name: hppRequest_dccEnable_pattern
data.value: DCC enable flag must be 1 or 0

data.name: hppRequest_hppFraudFilterMode_size
data.value: HPP Fraud Filter Mode flag must not be more than 7 characters in length

data.name: hppRequest_hppFraudFilterMode_pattern
data.value: HPP Fraud Filter Mode flag must be ACTIVE, PASSIVE or OFF

data.name: hppRequest_hppVersion_size
data.value: Version flag must not be more than 1 character in length

data.name: hppRequest_hppVersion_pattern
data.value: Version must only contain the numbers between 1 and 2

data.name: hppRequest_hppSelectStoredCard_size
data.value: Select stored card must not be more than 50 characters in length

data.name: hppRequest_hppSelectStoredCard_pattern
data.value: Select stored card must only contain the characters a-z A-Z\ 0-9 _ spaces

data.name: hppRequest_channel_pattern
data.value: Channel is optional but if set must be either "ECOM" or "MOTO"

data.name: hppRequest_channel_size
data.value: Channel is optional but if set must be either "ECOM" or "MOTO"

data.name: hppResponse_message_101
data.value: Transaction declined. Please check that you entered your card details correctly
data.comment: Declined by Bank – generally insufficient funds or incorrect card details (e.g. expiry date, card security code)

data.name: hppResponse_message_102
data.value: Transaction declined. Please check that you entered your card details correctly
data.comment: Referral to Bank (usually treated as a standard decline for ecommerce systems)

data.name: hppResponse_message_103
data.value: Transaction declined. Please check that you entered your card details correctly
data.comment: 103 Card reported lost or stolen; may be indicative of attempted fraud

data.name: hppResponse_message_2xx
data.value: Transaction failed due to error with bank systems
data.comment: Transaction failed due to error with bank systems

data.name: hppResponse_message_3xx
data.value: Transaction failed due to error with Realex systems
data.comment: Transaction failed due to error with Realex systems

data.name: hppResponse_message_107
data.value: Transaction declined. Please check that you entered your card details correctly
data.comment: The transaction has been blocked as potentially fraudulent by your fraud management configuration

data.name: hppResponse_message_1xx
data.value: Transaction declined. Please check that you entered your card details correctly

data.name: hppResponse_message_5xx
data.value: Error processing transaction
data.comment: Technical error. Check the log file

data.name: hppResponse_message_666
data.value: Error processing transaction

data.name: hppResponse_message_599
data.value: Error processing transaction
data.comment: Technical error - couldn't correctly process the HPPResponse

data.name: hppResponse_message_unknown
data.value: Error processing transaction
data.comment: Technical error, can't find a matching error message for the result code

data.name: hppResponse_message_598
data.value: Transaction successful, but error processing transaction
data.comment: The card transaction was successful but we could not process the response. Please contact us to resolve this problem.
